title: It would be great if the client would flash orange on invite/chat message like the air client.
body:
I've missed quite a few invites from my friends because I was watching something on my browser. The notification sound isn't enough. Feels like you need to actively keep your league client open in order to see invites.

{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

replies.body:
yes I third that?
it is a good idea, though not a new one as the old client does it.
I agree, I keep the sound off for most programs. The notification icon is very small otherwise and makes it hard to see.
